buildPhases.description: Initiates the competitive pricing workflow on an hourly schedule to ensure regular market monitoring and price adjustments.
Scrapes competitor websites and extracts product pricing and availability data using HTTP requests and HTML parsing techniques.
Uses AI to analyze scraped content and transforms raw data into structured pricing information with competitive analysis and recommendations.
Routes pricing decisions based on profit margin thresholds and competitive conditions to determine appropriate actions.
Updates inventory system with new pricing based on competitive analysis and profit margin calculations.
Sends real-time alerts via Slack for significant price changes and generates comprehensive daily email reports with recommendations.
Persists all competitive pricing data, analysis results, and pricing adjustments in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking and reporting.
